meanings.definition: To exist together or at the same time with something else.
meanings.sent1: The sun coassists with the moon in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The flowers and the bees coassists in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cat and the dog coassists peacefully in the house.
meanings.sent4: Laughter coassists with joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: Music coassists with emotions to create a beautiful melody.

meanings.definition: To work together with someone or something in a joint effort.
meanings.sent1: The students coassists to complete the group project.
meanings.sent2: The doctors and nurses coassists to save lives in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The ants coassists in carrying food back to their nest.
meanings.sent5: Hard work and determination coassists in reaching goals.
